messages.title: Personal Connection
messages.content: Darlington is where I was born and grew up.

leaflet.personalStatement: Darlington is where I was born and grew up. It's where I went to school and had my first job. Darlington has given me so much and I want to give something back to our town.

contactInformation.address: Unit 1B, Coniscliffe Court, Coniscliffe Road, Darlington, DL3 7RX

images.caption: Image of Peter Cuthbertson, Conservative Candidate for Darlington MP

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet mentions personal background and connection to the constituency.
